title: Handle Guest Complaint About Sound
description: A guest complains that the sound at a concert is painfully loud in their section.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the complaint and get the guest's exact seat location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the complaint and location.

tasks.description: Contact the in-house audio engineer at the soundboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reaches the audio engineer via radio.

tasks.description: Relay the complaint and ask the engineer to check the sound levels in that specific section.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer checks the levels and makes a slight adjustment to the mix for that area.

tasks.description: Offer the guest complimentary earplugs from the guest services booth.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent offers a solution to improve the guest's comfort.
